divs: Sighting Detailswas getting a ride home with my friend melanie from work when i noticed more strange lights. when she dropped me off I saw the disappearing lights again and a strange red glowing thing so i took pictures. the disappearing lights photographed as triangle shape, this is the 1st time i've seen the orb shaped craft.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Morrisville

This sighting has never been favorited.
